main.subAvatar: Software specialist, enthusiastic to teaching and learning, with experience in academic environments, industrial and Research and Develop environments

about.label: ABOUT

note.title: Note:
note.content: Currently I am working on two papers, a novel mHealth energy efficient integrated digital healthcare system and a review paper about IoMT and its privacy protection.

about.firstParagraph: My name is Alireza, and I'm {age} years old. Software specialist, enthusiastic about teaching and learning edge technologies, with experience in academic environments, industrial and Research and Develop environments. I'm studying master's degree in Software Engineering at IAU-NTB in the field of digital healthcare 4.0. I’m an indie developer working on an innovative digital healthcare startup. Currently, I’m actively pursuing preseed funding to recruit talented experts and expand our operations into the UAE, Saudi Arabia, and other Middle Eastern countries to have better development opportunity. In the future, we need embedded programmers, software and AI engineers especially in Iran. But with a volunteer based team, continuing without funding is unsustainable. So I'm desire to get cold call with investors who are interested in supporting and investing in our early stage startup. I'm able to online or in person meeting in UAE or Saudi Arabia.

experiences.label: Industrial Experiences
experiences.item1: In September 2024 we found the TaraMed and I'm head of software and AI engines as a Co-Founder. In our startup, we are revolutionizing digital healthcare by providing hardware and secure, intelligent software solutions. By integrating AI into our services, we aim to empower patients and healthcare professionals alike, ensuring more intelligent decision-making and improved care outcomes. At first phase, we are working on integration of Patients and Clinicians communication together with a GenAI medical assistant. We're designing a prototype and I called it MedLife T1. It's heart of this digital healthcare system. With this hardware we can measure the patient's vital signs in secure data communication. After first phase, we will make a smart wristband for patients and provide more AI tools to our AI platforms (we called it Humera). "Humera" has its roots in Old Persian from the Achaemenid era. "Hume" means savior or helper, and "mera" means "me" or "my." Ultimately, "Humera" means "my savior!"
experiences.item2: In December 2020 until now, I have developed a lot of applications for Modbus data gathering, React TCI smart parking project, Flutter application MCI smart parking project, Implementation of organizational (B2B) projects, Checking guest entrance and exit in Ayandeh Bank and Monitoring Front-end Application for gas pipeline from Abadan to Iraq-Basra
experiences.item3: In September 2023, I founded Labroo freedom Academy to teaching programming with Javascript and Typescript
experiences.item4: From July to November 2023, I had the opportunity to work with AJP Company | Nozhan Softwares as a Front-end Application Developer and UI/UX designer for the Mashinline Application. Mashinline is an online platform for dealing in industrial, agricultural machinery, and spare parts, offering both new and used products through direct and indirect methods in Iran and the UAE. During my time there, I worked on developing the client side of Mashinline using Flutter, and also contributed to the development of the admin panel using React.js.
experiences.item5: From December 2022 to March 2024, I have Implemented Desktop Application with Tauri for Sightence project Basir technologies. Sightence device is a body scanner (Efficient and cheaper version of Provision body scanner)
experiences.item6: In February 2021, I developed Flutter Mobile Application for distributed Iraqi online Store
experiences.item7: From 2017 to 2019, I interned in networking at Iran University of Science and Technology. During this time, I gained valuable experience in configuring Cisco switches, working with Linux, setting up servers, and dabbling in back-end development with Node.js.

educations.label: Educations
educations.item1: In September 2023: Azad University (IAU), North Tehran - Master's degree, Computer Software Engineering
educations.item2: From 2019 to 2023: Shamsipour Technical and Vocational College, Tehran - Bachelor's degree, Computer Software Engineering
educations.item3: From 2016 to 2019: Darolfonoon Technical and Professional Conservatory, Tehran — Computer Diploma

head.title: Papers and codes
head.content: Welcome to my impressive collection of groundbreaking work in Bachelor's and Master's Computer and Software Engineering! All of my research is freely accessible and open to contributions. I also share my additional papers and articles for download here.

item1.title: LamdaRED
item1.content: LamdaRED is a simple way to create your Requirement Engineering Diagrams without using a mouse or the complex interface of draw.io just by using straightforward syntax!

item2.title: Proteins Interactions Network Graph
item2.content: My recent research focuses on protein design to enhance the treatment of depression through serotonin modulation.

item3.title: Requirement Engineering Report
item3.content: Report of Explainable software system: from requirements analysis to system evaluation

item4.title: Block chain papers
item4.content: I’m working over data transformation based on blockchain networks. With this decentralized blocks we can transform data secretly. At this papers you can learn about blockchain in Persian language.

item5.title: RTOS Terminologies
item5.content: All terminologies I have learned from Reliable Real-Time Operating System for IoT Devices

item6.title: NoSQL  Breakdown report
item6.content: A Large-scale Analysis of Misconfigured NoSQL Services

item7.title: Addition Mesh
item7.content: Parallel addition mesh algorithm with Rust sample
